text: Hello all. How can I make a module full-width within a flexbox? By full-width, I mean expanding beyond the container of the flexbox, full-width of the browser. I can do this for all modules at once by targeting the flexbox containing everything, but I want to be able to drop in a full-width module anywhere in any flexbox.

i dont understand the question?  are you saying you have a flexible column with a max width and `margin: 0 auto` set on it and you have certain modules that you want to break out of that and be full width?

if that is what you want.  here is a very simple example of how you can break free of the tyranny of `.page-center`
<https://codepen.io/billyoncetoldme/pen/MWaawbp>
